block.stonenugget.stone_dust_ore.tooltip: A kind of ore that you can only find in The End.
item.stonenugget.stone_dust.tooltip: The necessary ingredient of crafting a stone nugget.
item.stonenugget.stone_nugget.tooltip.1: This is an important crafting ingredient.
item.stonenugget.stone_nugget.tooltip.2: You can also eat this item.
